703018f-a.text: Atlantic Ave., at the S.W. corner of Court Street, showing the corner occupied by the Dwyer Bros. rubber shop, being demolished for the new South Brooklyn Savings Bank building.  1922.  Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

703019f-a.text: Atlantic Ave., north side, west from Court Street. The building at the extreme right, is No. 83, about half way between, Court and Clinton Streets.  April 29, 1935. P.L. Sperr.
